actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

official_title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to increase the amount of the military death gratuity from $12,000 to $100,000.
short_title: Military Death Benefit Improvement Act of 2005

summary.text: Military Death Benefit Improvement Act of 2005 - Increases from $12,000 to $100,000 the death gratuity payable to the survivors of members of the Armed Forces who die: (1) while on active duty or inactive duty training; or (2) within 120 days after discharge or release from such duty or training, if the death resulted from an injury or disease incurred or aggravated during such duty or training.

titles.title: Military Death Benefit Improvement Act of 2005
To amend title 10, United States Code, to increase the amount of the military death gratuity from $12,000 to $100,000.
